name: Egg Teacher VR
description: Test your reflexes in varied challenges requiring speed and precision during the classes as an egg lecturer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better. Storage: 1430 MB available space
